SELECT USER_ID , DEPT_NM , USER_NM , CALL_AP_GRADE , AP_GRADE_NM , OFRM_TEL_NO , OFRM_TEL_NO2 , RNUM FROM ( SELECT USER_ID , DEPT_NM , CALL_AP_GRADE , AP_GRADE_NM , USER_NM , OFRM_TEL_NO , OFRM_TEL_NO2 , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID , A.DEPT_NM , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CODE WHERE LCODE='002' AND MCODE=A.CALL_AP_GRADE) AS AP_GRADE_NM , A.CALL_AP_GRADE , B.USER_NM , B.OFRM_TEL_NO , B.OFRM_TEL_NO2 FROM IF_CO_USER_HI A, IF_CO_USER_MA B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.RTRM_YN = 'N' AND A.LAST_YN = 'Y'
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{selUserId} || '%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{selUserNm} || '%'
AND A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' ||#{selDeptNm} || '%'
AND ( B.OFRM_TEL_NO LIKE '%' || #{selOfrmTelNo} || '%' OR B.OFRM_TEL_NO2 LIKE '%' || #{selOfrmTelNo} || '%')
ORDER BY B.USER_NM ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{fromRowPerPage} AND #{toRowPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCNT FROM IF_CO_USER_HI A, IF_CO_USER_MA B, TH_USER_PSWD C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.RTRM_YN = 'N' AND A.LAST_YN = 'Y' AND C.CURR_PSWD_YN = 'Y'
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{selUserId} || '%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{selUserNm} || '%'
AND A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' ||#{selDeptNm} || '%'
AND ( B.OFRM_TEL_NO LIKE '%' || #{selOfrmTelNo} || '%' OR B.OFRM_TEL_NO2 LIKE '%' || #{selOfrmTelNo} || '%')

SELECT A.USER_ID , A.DEPT_NM , A.RSPOFC_NM , A.OFCPS_NM , A.CALL_AP_GRADE , #{loginCallApGrade} AS AP_GRADE , B.USER_NM , B.OFRM_TEL_NO , B.OFRM_TEL_NO2 , C.PSWD_CHNG_DATE , C.LOGN_ATMP_CONT , C.INIT_PSWD_YN , C.LAST_LOGN_DATE FROM IF_CO_USER_HI A, IF_CO_USER_MA B, TH_USER_PSWD C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.RTRM_YN = 'N' AND A.LAST_YN = 'Y' AND C.CURR_PSWD_YN = 'Y' AND B.USER_ID = #{userId}
